description.name: WhatsApp Notify
description.tagline: Send Whatsapp notifications to client and admin
description.long: The WHMCS Whatsapp notification plugin for WHMCS is very useful, when you want to get notified via Whatsapp after placing an order. Buyer and seller both can get Whatsapp notification after an order is placed. Whatsapp notification options can be customized in the admin panel very easily.
features: New user sign-up with your website
Automated creation of services when order is placed
Welcome a user, password change, upgrade, suspension or more
Hosting or reseller account is created
Receive information when a product is out of stock
